query:
SELECT 
  t.id,
  t.titulo,
  t.estado,
  t.vistoGestor,
  t.atribuidoUserId,
  t.criadoPorId,
  u.name as atribuidoNome,
  creator.name as criadoPorNome
FROM todos t
LEFT JOIN users u ON t.atribuidoUserId = u.id
LEFT JOIN users creator ON t.criadoPorId = creator.id
WHERE t.estado IN ('pendente', 'em_progresso')
ORDER BY t.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 15
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2rEtBRZHWZUfGJS.3b07a01772f8 --database 3c9MozLH35e233uWy5WDtH --execute SELECT 
  t.id,
  t.titulo,
  t.estado,
  t.vistoGestor,
  t.atribuidoUserId,
  t.criadoPorId,
  u.name as atribuidoNome,
  creator.name as criadoPorNome
FROM todos t
LEFT JOIN users u ON t.atribuidoUserId = u.id
LEFT JOIN users creator ON t.criadoPorId = creator.id
WHERE t.estado IN ('pendente', 'em_progresso')
ORDER BY t.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 15
